General.Name: Atacama Copper Corporation
General.Description: Atacama Copper Corporation engages in the identification, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Chile. It explores for copper deposits. The company holds interest in El Cofre property that covers an area of approximately 7,628 hectares and 1,100 exploration concessions located in Santiago in the San Juan mining district. It also owns interests in the Placeton copper property covering an area of approximately of 7,257 hectares, as well as holds interest in 76 mining concessions through El Cofre and Placeton projects in Chile. Atacama Copper Corporation was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550-800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6

1.Name: Mr. Timothy Andrew Warman B.Sc., M.Sc, P.Geo.
